overview: At the age of fourteen, Tihei Harawira found his own unique way to connect with others â€“ through freestyle rapping.  Set in the vibrant world of the Otara Markets, amongst a community that has embraced Tihei, this film is an uplifting and inspiring look at a humble young man who has turned every challenge that he has faced into a positive.
tagline: As the beat drops can Tihei find his words? Redemption comes unscripted.
title: Tihei
